title: A calm and quiet villa for sale
details:
160 perches extend
Beyond the main road
Well water never dried up well
Respectable people around
Safety fence around the land
Specially built for tourists requirements
3.3 km to highway entrance at pinnaduwa
6.5 km to Galle
Very often bus service in front of the villa

NB:
Villa inspection only prior appointment.. No brokers please.
A real estate agency help them find a buyer.
